title: The Unborn: Sacrifice
description: A Chinese assassination squad hunts for Ross and Shan under the direction of Agent Quinn. Though marked for death, Ross and Shan race to stop the mutilation of Manhattan citizens across the blood-covered city. Unknown to Shan, within her body lies yet one more key Quinn will need in order to deliver control of the Hall of Souls to the Antichrist and secure his own future in the evil kingdom of the Antichrist now ruling earth through the U.N.
author: Donald Simmons
